jvx.curve

Class PgParmCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.object.PsObject
      • jv.project.PgGeometry
        • jv.geom.PgPointSet
          • jv.geom.PgPolygon
            • jvx.curve.PgParmCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, PsUpdateIf, PgGeometryIf

    public class PgParmCurve
extends PgPolygon
    A parametrized curve. Coordinate functions may be given as strings and interactively edited.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setFunction

        public boolean setFunction(PuFunction aFun)
        Set coordinate functions which may be interactively edited in the control panel. Number of functions must be equal to the vertex dimension of this surface.
